thread.title: Top 5 things to do in and around Bolton this weekend
thread.title_full: Top 5 things to do in and around Bolton this weekend

title: Top 5 things to do in and around Bolton this weekend
text:
1 comment 
1. WHP 2015 - For Twelve Weeks This City Is Ours, Store Street, Manchester, from 9pm 
Warehouse Project returns with a line up of top DJs including Duke Dumont – Live, Cajmere and Shadow Child. 
2. The Family Way, the Octagon Theatre , Bolton, Saturday 7.30pm 
The last chance to catch the Bill Naughton play set in 1960s Bolton, with many references to Bolton throughout, and follows optimistic newlyweds Arthur and Jenny Fitton, who are young, in love, and excited to embark on the rest of their lives together. 
3. Mama – all era Genesis tribute act, the Railway Venue, Bromley Cross , Saturday from 8pm 
The UK’s top tribute band to Genesis, which has been given the nod from none other than Phil Collins himself. 
4. John Emil, Ye Olde Man & Scythe, Churchgate, Saturday from 9pm 
USA slide blues and roots guitarist John Emil on his fourth UK tour. John Emil sings and plays delta blues and American roots songs on Hawaiian lap guitar. 
5. The North West Wedding and Venue Exhibition, the Premier Suite, Macron Stadium, Sunday between 11am and 4pm Share article 
A wedding fair where blushing brides and gorgeous grooms can pick up ideas and bargains for their special day. Promoted Stories Top 5 things to do in and around Bolton this weekend   boltonwanderers1877 10:48pm Fri 2 Oct 15
